name: 蔡一豪
objective:
本課程旨在深入講解常微分方程（ODEs）的基本理論與應用，涵蓋一階、二階及高階常微分方程，並介紹拉普拉斯變換、線性代數、傅立葉級數及積分與偏微分方程式的基本概念和應用。課程將幫助學生理解和解決複雜的微分方程，並掌握應用這些數學工具進行工程與科學問題的分析。
This course aims to provide an in-depth explanation of the basic theory and applications of ordinary differential equations (ODEs), covering first-order, second-order, and higher-order ODEs. It also introduces the basic concepts and applications of Laplace transforms, linear algebra, Fourier series and integrals, and partial differential equations. The course will help students understand and solve complex differential equations and master the use of these mathematical tools for analyzing engineering and scientific problems.
